data.eml:eml: Spiradiclis longanensis, a new species of Rubiaceae from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wen, Haizhen, Wang, Ruijiang, Deng, Shujun (2015): Spiradiclis longanensis, a new species of Rubiaceae from China. PhytoKeys 55: 113-117, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.55.4975, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.55.4975
